segments.text: I haven't received my credit card bill yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which credit card are you speaking of ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We sent that bill out a couple of weeks ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What am I going to do since I haven't received the bill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you haven't gotten it yet , then you should probably take that up with your post office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I get an extension on my bill if it does happen to be the post office's fault ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If that's the case , you will need to provide proof of their mistake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't mention it . Call back if you have any more questions .
segments.speaker: S2
